alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Lincoln; Logan; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 7:50PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Oklahoma, southwestern Lincoln, north central Cleveland, southern Logan, northeastern Canadian and northwestern Pottawatomie Counties through 830 PM CST... At 750 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Yukon to near Oklahoma City to near Moore. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, northwestern Norman, Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Guthrie, Yukon, Bethany, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Harrah, McLoud, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Nicoma Park, and Luther. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 111 and 159. Interstate 40 between mile markers 146 and 173. Interstate 44 between mile markers 116 and 158. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
